subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic, whose defeat of Jo-Wilfried Tsonga on Friday assures a No. 1 ranking, will play against Rafael Nadal at Wimbledon in the men’s singles final.
snippet: Novak Djokovic, whose defeat of Jo-Wilfried Tsonga on Friday assures a No. 1 ranking, will play against Rafael Nadal at Wimbledon in the men’s singles final.
